RelatedSentence: J Equity Partners chief executive Dr Ahmed Al Jawhary told a Press conference at the Gulf Hotel yesterday that the procedural aspects of the association had been completed , which would work under the ambit of the Central Bank of Bahrain .

RelatedSentence: Membership of the association was open to all three categories of licenced investment firms , both Sharia - compliant and conventional , he said .
